ChunkText: download a draft snapshot of your form i-765 application here see below electronic filing help for instructions on using the uscis online application system submit a complete stem OPT request in the isss portal upload the following: form i-983 training plan with all required signatures draft snapshot of your form i-765 copy of official transcript or diploma the transcript should clearly state your program major and the date when the degree was conferred or awarded.
ContextBefore: make sure that all fields are completed on the first four pages and that the form includes all required signatures student signs on page 1 and employer signs on pages 2 and 4 .
ContextAfter: ph.d. students must upload an official transcript because the diploma does not show the name of your program. remember: your employer must be enrolled and participating in e-verify!
